title: Trump officials move to kill plan for industry-led regulation of AI
description: The Coalition for Health AI has enlisted big names in health and tech to evaluate artificial intelligence tools that are now mostly unregulated.
content: AI is transforming care. Hospitals are adopting high-tech systems to improve diagnoses and recommend treatments, but there’s little formal regulation. The Food and Drug Administration, which oversees some of the tools, may not have all of the authori... [4793 chars]

title: Elon Musk announces xAI building 'Grokipedia' to rival Wikipedia amid bias accusations
description: Elon Musk said Tuesday that his artificial intelligence firm, xAI, is building “Grokipedia” – an open-source digital encyclopedia to rival Wikipedia, which has been accused online of leftist bias.
content:
Elon Musk said Tuesday that his artificial intelligence firm xAI is building “Grokipedia” – an open-source digital encyclopedia to rival Wikipedia, which the tech tycoon has repeatedly accused of leftist bias.

title: How AI will be used to help neighbours find lost dogs
description: Internet-connected doorbell cameras will be loaded with artificial intelligence software and used to identify lost pets, with the owners' permission.
content:
Lost dogs will become the next targets for artificial intelligence technology after a major tech company revealed plans to help track the pets using smart doorbells.

title: Dying Languages Won’t Be Saved by AI
description: The United Nations estimates that some 40% of languages spoken around the world face extinction. Can artificial intelligence slow this trend?
content:
The United Nations estimates that some 40% of languages spoken around the world face extinction. Can artificial intelligence slow this trend?

title: Altman makes AI deal with Samsung, SK to buy chips, build data centers in Korea
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman signed partnership deals for artificial intelligence with SK Hynix and Samsung in a visit to Korea Wednesday. He met with President Lee.
content:
Oct. 1 (UPI) -- OpenAI CEO Sam Altman signed partnership deals for artificial intelligence with SK Hynix and Samsung during a visit to South Korea Wednesday.

title: Google cuts more than 100 design-related roles in cloud unit
description: The latest layoffs come as Google accelerates cuts to focus spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:
Google has laid off more than 100 employees in design-related roles, CNBC has learned.
Earlier this week, the company laid off employees within the cloud unit's "quantitative user experience research" teams and "platform and service experience" teams... [1439 chars]

title: Which Ohio university added new Applied AI/Information Systems business degree?
description: One university in Ohio has launched a new Bachelor of Business Administration Degree in Applied Artificial Intelligence and Information Systems.
content:
AKRON, Ohio – The University of Akron this week announced it has launched a new Bachelor of Business Administration Degree in Applied Artificial Intelligence and Information Systems.

title: Amid budget cuts, Trump signs order funding artificial intelligence pediatric cancer research
description: President Trump signed an order authorizing funds for artificial intelligence to be implemented in childhood cancer research and data collection.
content:
President Donald Trump on Tuesday signed an executive order directing his administration to invest millions into artificial intelligence pediatric cancer research.
The order directs the Make America Healthy Again Commission to work with Health and Hu... [1498 chars]

title: Bachchans Move Delhi High Court Against AI Misuse Of Voice And Image, Target YouTube, Google
description: Bollywood actors Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan have approached the Delhi High Court, seeking protection of their voice, image, and persona from misuse in artificial intelligence-generated content. The couple has specifically targeted Google's YouTube, urging the platform to take down infringing videos and to introduce safeguards that prevent such content from being used to train other AI models.
